name: Mr Raw
description: '''Okechukwu Edwards Ukeje''' ({{Audio|LL-Q33578 (ibo)-Ebube Clara-Okechukwu Edwards Ukeje.wav|listen}}) better known as '''Mr Raw''', is a Nigerian rapper and songwriter who was born and raised in [[Enugu (city)|Enugu]]. A native of [[Abia State]], he previously went by the stage name '''Dat Nigga Raw''' and is a pioneer of [[Igbo rap]].
